div1.p: In the District Court of the United States for the Western District of Washington Northern Division
In re B.K. Sugiura and Albert H. Young, Habeas Corpus. No. 2628
Filed 190 Witness my hand and official seal this 12th day of March, 1915.
div1.ab: By Ed M Lakin Deputy Clerk
div1.p: In the matter of Albert H. Young, and B.K. Sugiura, for Writ of Habeas Corpus.

Now on this day this cause comes on for habeas corpus proceedings, the United States represented by Clay Allen, U.S. Attorney, and the Defendants represented by H.A.P. Mayers and R.N> McClelland. On motion of counsel said hearing is continued until Janurary 5, 1914, at two o'clock P.M.
